Posted By: Sean
Am looking to trade one of my Shorty Radford Old Judge (your choice) and my Al Myers Buchner Gold for darn near ANY other Old Judge. My only stipulation is the bottom isnt trimmed off. Im really looking for Outdoor poses or Detroits but Im not too picky.

OR

Will trade the two cards for a t202 Matty or low condition m116 Mordecai Brown or Joe Tinker

Please help me out!

Thanks [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]
